record.field.name: query
record.file.name: calendarFilterPredefined

brief.brief: A predefined filter based on the current record that will apply to the embedded calendar.

detail.detail: The format of the query should follow these rules:
1. The query field must be one of the filter fields defined in the filter form configuration.
2. Use " = " as the operator between the field and the value, and do not miss the space before and after the "=".
3. You can use $L.file in the value as a reference to the current record.
4. You can use "or" inside a group and "and" between groups and single fields.
The following is an example of the query:
assign.group = assignment in $L.file and (service = affected.item in $L.file or service = "all") and (location = location.full.name in $L.file or location = "all")
